Title.evidence: A Randomised Controlled Trial on Post-Operative Cognitive Dysfunction

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to critically appraise and define POCD, synthesizing its attributes, risk factors, and consequences.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the definition and characterization of POCD, assessed over several weeks to years.

Result_Outcome.evidence: POCD was characterized by subtle-to-extensive cognitive changes affecting single or multiple domains post-surgery, transient and reversible, lasting weeks to years.
